metadata.title: CVE-2020-7595 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
xmlStringLenDecodeEntities in parser.c in libxml2 2.9.10 has an infiniteloop in a certain end-of-file situation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-7595` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.3
libxml2-utils - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.3
python-libxml2 - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.3
python3-libxml2 - 2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.4+dfsg1-6.1ubuntu1.3').
